solution_line_template: The pebble's total splash width is {pebble_total_splash_width} meters because {num_pebbles} times {pebble_splash_width} equals <<{num_pebbles}*{pebble_splash_width}={pebble_total_splash_width}>>{pebble_total_splash_width}.

The rock's total splash width is {rock_total_splash_width} meters because {num_rocks} times {rock_splash_width} equals <<{num_rocks}*{rock_splash_width}={rock_total_splash_width}>>{rock_total_splash_width}.
The boulder's total splash width is {boulder_total_splash_width} because {num_boulders} times {boulder_splash_width} equals {boulder_total_splash_width}.
The total splash width for all the rocks is {total_splash_width} because {pebble_total_splash_width} plus {rock_total_splash_width} plus {boulder_total_splash_width} equals {total_splash_width}.
